document.full_text: florida beat san francisco 1-0 on thursday to complete a rare three-game sweep over the giants and add insult to injury for the reigning world series champions.
document.title: marlins add to giants' day of misery
lines_and_colors: florida beat san francisco 1-0 on thursday to complete a rare three-game sweep over the giants and add insult to injury for the reigning world series champions.
